japanese: どこかで聞いた[メロディ]。なんとなくうまく弾けた……

definitions: 弾ける[はじける] (v1, vi) to burst open, to split open, to pop,to be bursting with (e.g. youth, laughter, flavor),to bounce, to bound
english: I've heard this melody somewhere before. I played it well.
japanese: どこかで聞いたメロディ。なんとなくうまく[弾け]た……

顎[あご] (n, adj-no) chin, jaw

萼[がく] (n) calyx
english: I have the sheet music for that song.
japanese: その曲なら、[がく]ふがあるわ

definitions: 及ぶ[およぶ] (v5b, vi) to reach, to amount to, to befall, to happen to, to extend,to be up to the task, to come up to,to compare with, to be a match (for),to commit (a crime),to require (to do)
english: TIFA, what's happened to our town? Was it all an illusion, or just a dream? No, it was neither. I remember trying to get people out of the flames, but not having the strength… Burning with anger, I went to the reactor to kill Sephiroth.
japanese: TIFAよこの村はいったいどうなっているのだ？あれは幻、それとも夢だったのか？いや、そんなはずはない。私ははっきりと覚えている。炎の中から無事な者を救いだそうとしたが力[およば]ず……怒りに燃えた私はセフィロスを倒すべく魔晄炉へ向かった。

definitions: 指揮[しき] (n, vs, adj-no) command, direction
english: I recall a scientist named Hojo was in charge. He ordered the troops to gather up everyone still alive for the experiment. I didn't know what type of experiment he was talking about, but I wasn't about to let them have my dearest student.
japanese: [指揮]をとっていたのは、たしか宝条という科学者だったと記憶している。宝条は【少しでも息のある者は実験用に集めておけ】と兵士たちに命令していた。何の実験だか知らないが、かわいい弟子を渡すわけにはいかない。

definitions: 預ける[あずける] (v1, vt) to leave (in someone's keeping), to put (in someone's care), to place (in someone's custody), to entrust (someone) with, to deposit,to put (someone) in charge of, to leave (a matter) in someone's hands, to let (someone) decide,to lean on, to put one's weight on
english: I decided to go to Midgar to find a doctor I could trust. I'm worried about you, but I can't settle down in one place for very long.
japanese: ミッドガルの信頼できる医者におまえを[あずけ]て私は再び旅に出ることにした。おまえのことは心配だったがひとつ場所にとどまっていられないのが私の性分だ。

definitions: 再び[ふたたび] (adv) again, once more, a second time
english: I decided to go to Midgar to find a doctor I could trust. I'm worried about you, but I can't settle down in one place for very long.
japanese: ミッドガルの信頼できる医者におまえをあずけて私は[再び]旅に出ることにした。おまえのことは心配だったがひとつ場所にとどまっていられないのが私の性分だ。

definitions: 止まる[とどまる] (v5r, vi) to remain, to abide, to stay (in the one place),to be limited to, to be confined to
english: I decided to go to Midgar to find a doctor I could trust. I'm worried about you, but I can't settle down in one place for very long.
japanese: ミッドガルの信頼できる医者におまえをあずけて私は再び旅に出ることにした。おまえのことは心配だったがひとつ場所に[とどまっ]ていられないのが私の性分だ。

definitions: 性分[しょうぶん] (n) nature, disposition
english: I decided to go to Midgar to find a doctor I could trust. I'm worried about you, but I can't settle down in one place for very long.
japanese: ミッドガルの信頼できる医者におまえをあずけて私は再び旅に出ることにした。おまえのことは心配だったがひとつ場所にとどまっていられないのが私の[性分]だ。

definitions: 傷[きず] (n) wound, injury, cut, gash, bruise, scratch, scrape, scar,chip, crack, scratch, nick,flaw, defect, weakness, weak point,stain (on one's reputation), disgrace, dishonor, dishonour,(emotional) hurt, hurt feelings
english: Have you recovered fully? Are you well?
japanese: [傷]はすっかり良くなっただろうか？元気にしているだろうか？

definitions: ふらり (adv, adv-to) aimlessly, unexpectedly (showing up),slowly swaying, staggering, moving feebly
english: I wonder how many years have passed since then? I just got into town again, but I can't believe it… The whole town is back to normal, except for the strange people with black clothes all around.
japanese: あれから、何年がすぎたのだ？私は[ふらり]とこの村に戻ってきたが正直なところ、おどろいている。村は元通りだが、黒い服の不気味な者たちがうろついている……。

definitions: 元通り[もとどおり] (adj-na, n-t) as before, as ever
english: I wonder how many years have passed since then? I just got into town again, but I can't believe it… The whole town is back to normal, except for the strange people with black clothes all around.
japanese: あれから、何年がすぎたのだ？私はふらりとこの村に戻ってきたが正直なところ、おどろいている。村は[元通り]だが、黒い服の不気味な者たちがうろついている……。

definitions: プンプン (adv, adv-to, vs) (smelling) strongly, pungently,furiously, indignantly, fuming, in a huff
english: The town reeks of Shinra, but I won't go after them. You may think I'm running from them, but it's just that I don't want anything to do with Shinra anymore. Feels like time is running out.
japanese: 神羅のにおいが[ぷんぷん]するが私は深追いするつもりはない。逃げていると言われればそれまでだが神羅にかかわるのは、もういやなのだ。さて、TIFA。この家の者が戻って来ないうちにここを立ち去らなくてはならない。時間はなさそうだ。

definitions: 深追い[ふかおい] (n, vs) chasing too far, pursuing relentlessly
english: The town reeks of Shinra, but I won't go after them. You may think I'm running from them, but it's just that I don't want anything to do with Shinra anymore. Feels like time is running out.
japanese: 神羅のにおいがぷんぷんするが私は[深追い]するつもりはない。逃げていると言われればそれまでだが神羅にかかわるのは、もういやなのだ。さて、TIFA。この家の者が戻って来ないうちにここを立ち去らなくてはならない。時間はなさそうだ。

definitions: 老いる[おいる] (v1, vi) to age, to grow old
english: I want to give it to you myself, but it's hard for my students to see me as an old man. I can't even jump anymore. But I hope you continue to sharpen your skills and remember what I taught you.
japanese: 直接渡したいところだが弟子に[老い]た自分を見られるのはつらい。もう私はジャンプさえ出来なくなってしまった。私の技、おまえがみがきあげてくれることをねがっている。

definitions: 奥義[おうぎ] (n) secret techniques, inner mysteries, esoterica, hidden purpose, quintessence (of art, skill)

japanese: TIFAの最終[奥義]

japanese: [逃亡]者に関する報告書　１Ｘ月Ｘ日当施設から逃亡した２名をミッドガル近辺で発見しました]

definitions: 月[つき] (n-t) moon,month
月[がつ] (n-suf) month (of the year), used after number or question word (e.g. nan or nani)
月[げつ] (n) Monday

japanese: 逃亡者に関する報告書　１Ｘ月Ｘ日当施設から逃亡した２名をミッドガル[近辺]で発見しました]

灯[ともし] (n) light, lamp,baiting deer with a lighted torch
english: A  Former member of SOLDIER/Number(   ) No effect could be detected from either Mako Radiation Therapy or Jenova on him.

japanese: Ａ　抵抗したため、[射殺]。

definitions: 進行[しんこう] (n) moving forward (e.g. vehicle), onward movement,advance (work, procedure, etc), advancement, progress,progress (of a disease), disease progression,progression (harmonic, melodic)
english: B's whereabouts is currently unknown. But pursuit is unnecessary due to his diminishing consciousness. Awaiting further instructions.
japanese: 現在、Ｂの行方は不明です。しかし、Ｂは意識の乱れがかなり[進行]している様子でしたのでこのまま放置しておいても間題は無いというのが我々の見解です。今後に関する指示をおねがいします

definitions: 放置[ほうち] (n, vs) leaving as is, leaving alone, leaving to chance, neglecting, abandoning
english: B's whereabouts is currently unknown. But pursuit is unnecessary due to his diminishing consciousness. Awaiting further instructions.
japanese: 現在、Ｂの行方は不明です。しかし、Ｂは意識の乱れがかなり進行している様子でしたのでこのまま[放置]しておいても間題は無いというのが我々の見解です。今後に関する指示をおねがいします

definitions: 見解[けんかい] (n) opinion, point of view
english: B's whereabouts is currently unknown. But pursuit is unnecessary due to his diminishing consciousness. Awaiting further instructions.
japanese: 現在、Ｂの行方は不明です。しかし、Ｂは意識の乱れがかなり進行している様子でしたのでこのまま放置しておいても間題は無いというのが我々の[見解]です。今後に関する指示をおねがいします

definitions: 厄[やく] (n) misfortune, bad luck, evil, disaster
english: Jenova will be at the Reunion. Jenova will join the Reunion, becoming a calamity from the skies.
japanese: ジェノバはリユニオンするものだ。ジェノバはリユニオンして空から来た[厄]災となる

definitions: 自覚[じかく] (n, vs) self-consciousness, self-awareness
english: I will go North past Mt. Nibel. If you wish to know…then follow…
japanese: わたしは【ニブル山をこえて北】へいく。もしお前が[自覚]するならば……わたしを追ってくるがよい

definitions: 取り除く[とりのぞく] (v5k, vt) to remove, to deinstall, to take away, to set apart
english: I must get rid of all those that stand in the way of my research. Even that one from the Turks.
japanese: 私の研究の邪魔をする者を全て[取り除か]なければならない。タークスのあの男も例外ではない

definitions: 生体[せいたい] (n, adj-no) organism, living body
english: I scientifically altered him and put him to sleep in the basement. If you want to find him, search the area.
japanese: 私はタークスの男に[生体]学的な改造をほどこし、地下に眠らせた。もし興味があるなら探してみるがよい

definitions: 改造[かいぞう] (n, vs) remodeling, remodelling, restructuring, reconstruction, reshuffling (e.g. cabinet),modding
english: I scientifically altered him and put him to sleep in the basement. If you want to find him, search the area.
japanese: 私はタークスの男に生体学的な[改造]をほどこし、地下に眠らせた。もし興味があるなら探してみるがよい

definitions: 施す[ほどこす] (v5s, vt) to give (time, money, goods), to donate,to do, to perform, to conduct,to apply (processing, makeup, etc.), to add (e.g. ornamentation, annotation),to sow, to seed, to scatter (e.g. fertilizer), to sprinkle,to spread far and wide
english: I scientifically altered him and put him to sleep in the basement. If you want to find him, search the area.
japanese: 私はタークスの男に生体学的な改造を[ほどこし]、地下に眠らせた。もし興味があるなら探してみるがよい

definitions: 飽くまで[あくまで] (adv) to the end, to the bitter end, to the last, stubbornly, persistently, consistently, to the utmost,after all, it must be remembered, only, purely, simply
english: But…this is merely a game I thought of. It is not necessary for you to participate if you don't want to.
japanese: ただし……これは[あくまで]私がきまぐれでおもいついたゲームにすぎない。むりにつきあってくれる必要はない

definitions: 気まぐれ[きまぐれ] (adj-na, n) whim, caprice, whimsy, fickle, moody, uneven temper
english: But…this is merely a game I thought of. It is not necessary for you to participate if you don't want to.
japanese: ただし……これはあくまで私が[きまぐれ]でおもいついたゲームにすぎない。むりにつきあってくれる必要はない

definitions: 思いつく[おもいつく] (v5k, vt, vi) to think of, to hit upon, to come into one's mind, to be struck with an idea,to remember, to recall
english: But…this is merely a game I thought of. It is not necessary for you to participate if you don't want to.
japanese: ただし……これはあくまで私がきまぐれで[おもいつい]たゲームにすぎない。むりにつきあってくれる必要はない

definitions: 用紙[ようし] (n) blank form,sheets of paper, sheet of paper
english: Read it
japanese: もう１まいの[用紙]をみる

definitions: ダイヤル (n, vs) dial (e.g. telephone, radio, clock, gauge)
english: Move the dial on the safe carefully but quickly. You have 20 seconds. You can not go past the numbers while turning. The 4 hints for the numbers are…
japanese: 金庫の[ダイヤル]はしんちょうにかつ、すばやくまわす。２０秒以内だ。少しでも行き過ぎてはいけない。４つのダイヤルのヒントは……

definitions: 以内[いない] (n, n-suf) within, inside of, less than
english: Move the dial on the safe carefully but quickly. You have 20 seconds. You can not go past the numbers while turning. The 4 hints for the numbers are…
japanese: 金庫のダイヤルはしんちょうにかつ、すばやくまわす。２０秒[以内]だ。少しでも行き過ぎてはいけない。４つのダイヤルのヒントは……

definitions: 行き過ぎる[いきすぎる] (v1, vi) to go too far, to go past,to go to extremes, to overdo it
english: Move the dial on the safe carefully but quickly. You have 20 seconds. You can not go past the numbers while turning. The 4 hints for the numbers are…
japanese: 金庫のダイヤルはしんちょうにかつ、すばやくまわす。２０秒以内だ。少しでも[行き過ぎ]てはいけない。４つのダイヤルのヒントは……

definitions: 酸素[さんそ] (n, adj-no) oxygen (O)
english: The lid of the box with the most oxygen.
japanese: [酸素]が一番多いハコのふた

definitions: 箱[はこ] (suf, ctr) box, case, chest, package, pack, crate,car (of a train, etc.),shamisen case, shamisen,public building, community building,man who carries a geisha's shamisen,receptacle for human waste, feces (faeces),counter for boxes (or boxed objects)
english: The lid of the box with the most oxygen.
japanese: 酸素が一番多い[ハコ]のふた

definitions: 床[ゆか] (n) floor,stage (for the narrator and the shamisen player),dining platform built across a river
河床[かしょう] (n) riverbed,raised platform on the bank of a river for enjoying the cool in summer
english: The creek in the floor near the chair on the second floor… then to the left five steps, up nine steps, left two steps, and up six steps.
japanese: ２階のイスのそばの[ユカ]のきしみ……そこから左５歩、上９歩、左２歩、上６歩

definitions: 軋む[きしむ] (v5m, vi) to jar, to creak, to grate
english: The creek in the floor near the chair on the second floor… then to the left five steps, up nine steps, left two steps, and up six steps.
japanese: ２階のイスのそばのユカの[きしみ]……そこから左５歩、上９歩、左２歩、上６歩

definitions: あぶり出す[あぶりだす] (v5s, vt) to bring into the open, to reveal, to uncover (e.g. evidence), to bring to light
english: The fourth row has been written in invisible ink…
japanese: ４行目が[あぶりださ]れた……
